title: [Large-scale] International Business Communication Competency Enhancement Program for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and introductory awareness of international business contexts
context.additional_context: Emphasizes practical competency development for on-the-job application by current professionals, with a focus on enhancing accessibility and engagement through smartphone utilization.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize negotiation and presentation English expressions required in international business contexts with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can present three or more business communication strategies considering cultural differences through role-playing.
Learners can improve collaboration and feedback skills with peers through task-based learning activities and submit outcomes reflecting these improvements.

resources: Simple Video Production Tool (Smartphone Camera, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
